programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: Lou Clark knows lots of things. What Lou doesn't know is she's about to lose her job or that knowing what's coming is what keeps her sane. Will Traynor knows a car accident took away his desire to live. He knows everything feels very small and rather joyless now and he knows exactly how he's going to put a stop to that. What Will doesn't know is that Lou is about to burst into his world in a riot of color. And neither of them knows they're going to change each other for all time.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 137
programme.desc: A 2-year-old boy dies of shaken-baby syndrome, but his parents maintain their innocence and tell Dr. Oz their side of the story; a sociopath cop uses his power to prey on women for years, until a whistle-blower brings him down.

programme.title: The Flash S4 - EP 10
programme.desc: Joe and Iris must decide how far they're willing to go to keep Barry out of prison as his trial for the murder of Clifford DeVoe begins.

programme.title: The Flash S4 - EP 11
programme.desc: A familiar villain returns to terrorise Central City. Ralph must rise up to defend the innocent while Barry is detained by his trial. Barry searches for the strength to keep his optimism alive in the face of his new circumstances.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 13
programme.desc: In a remote part of Ladakh not even listed on Google Maps, is an unknown village in Leh that is completely devoid of electricity. The remoteness and rugged mountain terrain makes laying conventional power lines impossible. Host Paul Foster is on a special mission to deliver a micro-grid energy system to the people of this village. Carrying a fragile and unwieldy solar panel for days up the unforgiving terrain is a challenge that even the super fit Paul will struggle with.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 超凡魔术师 The Amazing Magicians - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) "The Amazing Magicians" is a China variety show in which the show contestants are chosen through "pick a million" competition system.The program includes the best behind-the-scenes players from Hollywood and the world of Magicians. (重)《超凡魔术师》是出自中国的综艺节目。节目采取了“万里挑一"的赛制。此外节目还邀请到了好莱坞和魔术届最强的幕后班底。.

programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 224

programme.title: 开门见餐 Home Dining - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) What's Eurasian cuisine? Have you ever heard about Eurasian cuisine? Kurt Drysdale is a self-taught baker and home cook. He believes in traditional recipes handed down through generations for a wonderful gastronomic experience. Menu includes Eurasian signature dish - Shepherd's Pie and Devil Curry. Any secret recipe will be revealed? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)你听过欧亚裔料理吗？身为一名家厨，Kurt Drysdale希望通过厨艺，把祖传的欧亚裔料理发扬光大，并让大众进一步认识欧亚裔文化。他精心为宾客准备的佳肴，包括了牧羊烤派、杂烩咖喱、马铃薯肉饼和黄梨虾咖喱。它们可都是欧亚裔的经典料理，想大开眼界吗？欢迎你一起来“开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 说再见 Say Goodbye - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) A reality documentary series that re-connects the audience to life's greatest and most powerful emotions - accomplishment, nostalgia, exhilaration, disappointment, sadness, heartaches, happiness, remorsefulness, hope and even spiritual enlightenment, as we follow the character through his-her final day of endeavor. (重).

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) (Part 1) Yi Ai is unable to accept that Li An has asked for a break-up. Yongzheng is confident that he can help Yi Ai move on by engaging her in family activities. However, Yi Ai goes missing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(第25集上)立安向以爱表明要分手，以爱未能接受，整天自暴自弃宅在家。永正有信心可为她提供家庭温暖。黄家准备好家庭活动，怎料以爱失踪.

programme.desc: (R) Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 67
programme.desc: (R) Jin Zhi is followed by a mysterious person. Deng Bo arrives and chases him off and gets hurt in the process. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)金枝埋首包云吞，没察觉到一陌生男子正慢慢靠近她，对方正欲有所行动，邓波及时出现，对方事机败露，急忙离开。邓波追去，被对方用利器攻击。金枝不信，指邓波危言耸听，目的是能名正言顺地留下来。邓波不愿辩驳，继续默默守护金枝。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This week's Small Town Surprises brings us back to Terengganu! What other fun surprises await us in this episode? Follow our host, Hui Xin, and the Foo Family as they have a taste of the local Peranakan delicacies in Terengganu's Chinatown. The Foo sisters also learn about self-defense from a Silat master, as well as the unique art of wood carving in Terengganu! (重)这一集的《小城花样多》带大家回到了登嘉楼！登嘉楼还有什么好吃好玩的呢？跟着城管慧馨，还有我们的符家，到登嘉楼的唐人街品尝让人垂涎三尺的道地娘惹美食！符家姐妹花也向当地的马来传统武术老师学习了实用的防身术。他们还拜见了经验老道的木雕刻师傅，深入了解登嘉楼独具特色的木雕刻手艺！.

programme.desc: (R) A story about daddies who are also nannies. (重).

programme.desc: (R) Judy tells Xiu Yu that the whole meeting with spirit medium was a deliberate arrangement to test her. Judy says that she is actually a lawyer, executing the will on behalf of Wei De. Wei Des days were numbered as he had contracted cancer and he was worried about Xiu Yus welfare upon his passing. Thus Wei De drew up a will leaving Judy as the administrator of his assets which can only be given to Xiu Yu once she is able to live independently. (PG)(重)Judy告诉秀玉，灵媒的事是她故意安排，以试探她。她的真正身份是个律师，受韦德所托，完成他的遗愿。韦德因患癌，时日无多，担心妻女在他离世后的生活。他于是立下遗嘱，将另一笔遗产交给Judy管理，要确定秀玉能够独立生活后才能交给她。.

programme.title: 内颤 Terror Within - EP 1

(PG-些许暴力画面)(首播)恐怖袭击后的一个星期，心理医生明洁替生还者们进行辅导。在大家的形容下，明洁逐渐拼凑出当天的画面。因为孙子志雄的所作所为，王婆婆受到街坊们的唾弃。明洁试图帮忙，却也遭受攻击。.

programme.title: 星期二特写- 人生八九十2 Tuesday Report - Ninety Years Young 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Singaporeans live the longest in the world with an expected lifespan of 84.8 years. The series follows the success of its first season and continues to feature several senior citizens, showing their positive outlooks towards twilight years. 新加坡人越来越长寿，平均可活到84.8 岁。第二系列的《人生八九十》发掘和展现更多长者的人生姿彩。有的曾经叱咤风云，有的老来追求梦想，他们如何让黄金岁月充溢能量？.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 13

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 68

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 165
programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 320
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Xiu Yu goes to look for Judy who tells her that if she is able to complete the task that Wei De had listed, she would inherit his assets. However if Xiu Yu fails, the assets will be donated to charity. Judy hands the first letter over to Xiu Yu; surprisingly the first task that Wei De gives Xiu Yu is to pick up Muay Thai! (重)秀玉去找Judy，Judy表示如果秀玉能完成韦德生前定下的任务，就能继承遗产，若是放弃，遗产将捐给慈善机构。Judy交给秀玉第一个信封，没想到韦德给秀玉的第一个任务，竟是要她去学泰拳！.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 92
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 26
programme.desc: (Part 1) Yongzheng is pleased with Weijia's effort and dedication to the company. He decides to promote Weijia as the Assistant CEO. Bei Er shows her support. Weijia is dejected after Yalin rejects his proposal to set up a charity fund. (PG)(第26集上)永正见围家最近为公司劳心劳力，长进不少，便于会议期间提出晋升围家为助理行政总裁，贝儿和议。围家提议办慈善基金，遭雅麟否决，令围家沮丧。.

programme.title: A Taste Of Festival - EP 6
programme.desc: Wedding is a big event in life. Let's learn banquet dishes from various restaurants, such as chrysanthemum fish, passion fruit salad prawns & sous vide grilled pork ribs, Peranakan wedding customs & wedding cakes. Chef Miller also demonstrates a betrothal dish - Steamed Cod Fish with Coconut Water. 结婚，是人生中的头等大事。主持人除了走访几家餐馆，了解婚宴菜肴如菊花鱼、百香果沙律明虾、低温香烤排骨的烹调手法之外，也会介绍土生华人的婚礼习俗和婚庆糕点。厨师麦大融则示范以过大礼的食品烹煮椰汁蒸鳕鱼。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 14
programme.desc: Zi Le meets Yu Wen's parents officially. Hao Xiang recognises Zi Le as the delivery boy and is concerned. Through Da Wei's guidance, Zi Le was able to answer questions smoothly and also succeeds in suppressing his illness. Hao Xiang's impression of Zi Le changes. (PG)子乐正式拜见雨汶父母，浩翔认出他就是那个送餐员，脸色一沉。子乐依照达威的教导，对答入流，并成功控制自己不让病情发作，令浩翔对他印象改观。.

programme.title: 生产者 Food Producers S1 - EP 12

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 26
programme.desc: The aggressive Jiang Cheng duels with Wei Wuxian, and Wei Wuxian returned wounded to the unmarked graveyard. 江澄气势汹汹地来找魏无羡对决， 魏无羡带着伤回到乱葬岗。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 Say It ! - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This week, En Lai and Vivian will be tour guides to a group of tourists as they travel around the hustle and bustle of Singapore, teaching tourists various camera poses and answering their endless questions! (重)《好好说 慢慢讲》这集恩来和怡伶要当导游，分别要带领中国、台湾来的游客去品尝新加坡道地的美食和带外国朋友到处摄影，教他们摆不同的姿势，并捕捉富有本地特色的生活照！面对好奇宝宝们滔滔不绝的问题，恩来如何用华语应付？而摄影团的朋友居然争风吃醋了起来，怡伶又得怎么用英语来调解纠纷？.

(PG)(重)金枝气自己连犯错误，不止摔碗发泄，还把自己关在厕所里。媚媚拍门，金枝不应，大家担心她会做傻事，邓波欲破门而入，金枝忽然开门出来，说自己坐在马桶上睡着了，叫大家不要担心她。但大家明显看出金枝哭过，无不忧心忡忡。.

programme.desc: (R) The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重)美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

Xiu Yu is fired up by Judy's words and is determined to obtain the basic level and fulfill Wei De's wishes. (PG)(重)泰拳馆里，Judy将秀玉打倒，这一幕刚好被嘉琪与成光目睹，两人都感错愕。嘉琪怒责Judy存心伤害秀玉，Judy讥讽秀玉不堪一击，将无法完成韦德定下的不可能的任务。秀玉听了Judy的话，反而被激起斗志，誓言一定要考到初级认可，完成韦德的遗愿。.

programme.desc: (Part 2) Shunhua invites an old friend, Shen Zhui, back to the Huangs residence to have a hotpot meal. Amid the joyous atmosphere, Shen Zhui behaves strangely. Yi Ai finds out that Shen Zhui has been short-selling Xu Wang Group stocks and stirring up trouble at the eatery. When confronted, Shen Zhui claims that she is trying to get back at Liying for stealing her love. (PG)(第26集下)丽荧约见加拿大返港的旧友沈沝，顺华还请她到黄家作客吃火锅，欢愉气氛中沈沝却表现怪异。许旺股票突然被沽空，茶餐厅又不停接到客人投诉，以爱查出是沈沝所为。顺华质问沈沝，沈沝狡辩又指控丽荧横刀夺爱！.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses terms like Sa Ka (flatter), Kahwin (marriage), Mangka Kar and other words borrowed from English and Malay, and explains the use of "Holland" In many Chinese phrases and nouns. 《新语研究所 2 》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。这一集谈三脚、芒加脚、交姻以及受英语和马来语影响的词汇，并且探讨为什么引人上当也叫做带你去荷兰。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 15
programme.desc: Davis misunderstands that An Qi went back to her old trade. When Da Wei finds out about An Qi's past, he is upset and leaves the house. Davis realises that he misunderstood An Qi and is at a loss. An Qi's heart wrenches as she recalls her unthinkable past. (PG)Davis误会安琪重操旧业，抖出安琪的过去。达威得知安琪曾经出卖肉体，难以接受，夺门而出。Davis发现自己误会安琪，不知如何是好。安琪想起自己不堪的过去，痛彻心扉。.

(PG)(重)(大结局)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

(重)第二系列的"仁心侠旅"，主持人前往亚洲各地去关注更多不平不公的社会现象。本系列将眼光锁定在亚洲长期存在的几个棘手问题-粮食和食水不足，基本医疗缺乏，以及弱势群体的极端边缘化。.

programme.title: Body SOS Sr 8 - EP 29

programme.title: 叛逆战队 Devil's Blues - EP 11
programme.desc: With the arrival of the new century, crime is constantly manifesting itself in different ways. The new era brings forth prosperity and at the same time, a host of new deviant patterns from the young generation. Traditional methodology to fight crime is no longer effective in these times of swift changes. The police hence decide to set up a task force specializing in new-age criminology, getting the youths themselves to combat youth crimes: the Devil Drifters team is born! 故事讲述叛逆战队统帅狄军一直带领着战队以非一般的办案方式与超乎常规的手段，破获了不少一般警察不能应付的另类案件。狄军一直尽忠职守，但由于环境关系，他办案时所采用的非常手段却未能得到警方高层的支持和谅解，反而惹来了常规警员的非议与否定，而狄军在一次行动中，更落得有队员惨死的收场，令高层下令解散战队，幸而在狄军据理力争之下，终于换来一次证明自己的最后机会，上级决定派人到战队监察，为期三个月，藉此决定战…….

programme.title: 我家是联合国 Home of United Nations - EP 5
programme.desc: (14),,. ,,,, 一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 45
programme.desc: The Young Xiao Shiye is known for his strong sense of justice and integrity. He uses his wisdom and wit to solve the people's daily problems and many challenges. 小师爷真名施野，极富侠气和正义感。日常生活中，用自己的智慧和勇气，克服各种困难，帮周围的人解决了大大小小的麻烦，维护了正义和公理。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 4
programme.desc: Japan is an affluent society, which is why the issue of poverty often overlooked. In Osaka, there was an unfortunate incident where a mother and child starved to death at home. Determined to help the poor, a few monks decided to establish an anti-poverty organization that distributes temple offerings as gifts to families-in-need, providing them hope and bringing joy. 日本虽然是个富裕的社会，但是正因为贫穷问题不明显，挨饿的人往往更容易被忽略和遗忘。大阪就曾发生母子困在家中活活饿死的事件。一些僧侣为此发起了一个救贫组织，将庙宇的供品转送给贫穷家庭作礼物，带给他们欢乐。僧侣和志工们奔波忙碌，一起尝到助人为快乐之本的味道，也体验了幸福的真谛。.

Xihao notices that Jizhu is hiding something.Ep20Minzhu informs Xihao immediately once she gets Cui Junxia's address from her father. KTOP's Junshuo reaches Junxia ahead of Xihao. He asks Junxia to return to Australia to avoid Xihao. Xihao leaves a note at the hote Ep 19 吉柱意图说服锡浩别让他的乐团去电视台上那"经典重现"的综艺节目演出和演唱崔俊夏的歌，但因乐团难得有机会上节目，锡浩拒绝了。锡浩发现到吉柱在隐瞒一些事。Ep 20敏珠从她父亲那儿得到崔俊夏的住址就立刻通知锡浩。KTOP的俊硕比锡浩快一步找到俊夏，他叫俊夏快回澳大利亚以避开锡浩。锡浩在酒店留下了字条约俊夏见面。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 25
programme.desc: Xuehua blushes when she falls into Xixun's arm. Lanxue is glad that her son, Zhixiang, is willing to work in his father's company. Feeling guilty to cause Xuehua lost her job, Junxiang tries to help Xuehua gets a job in his father's company. 因不小心拥在锡勋怀中, 雪花突然害羞起来.兰雪知道儿子智相愿意回来父亲公司工作, 大感安慰.害雪花丢失工作, 俊相设法帮她在父亲公司务寻工作.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 26
programme.desc: Zhengdao and Qiuzi find excuses to stop Xixun when he wants to change his surname to Qin. Junxiang's grandma flares up when she learnt that Lanxue has prejudices against Junxiang. 但锡勋提意改性为琴, 政道与秋子找借口推迟. 俊相奶奶听到兰雪对俊相有偏见,打发雷霆.

programme.title: 食尚玩家欢乐有够赞 Super Taste Super Joy - EP 1
programme.desc: A studio based variety show on quizes about food and cooking, histed by popular food hosts Zeng Guo Cheng and James (I-Walker). TVBS招牌节目《食尚玩家》改版，不仅节目名称换成《食尚玩家欢乐有够赞》，主持班底也确定以曾国城搭档詹姆士，配上外景双人组曾子余、Dora。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 5
programme.desc: Ep 5: Shan'ni is instructed to ride on a crane during the wedding to wave to the guests. The crane gives way suddenly, causing Shan'ni to dangle in mid-air. No one from the royal family lend Shan'ni a helping hand. Youbin saves Shan'ni in the nick of time. 珊妮必须在结婚典礼上搭乘升降机向贵宾们挥手。升降机被人动了手脚，令珊妮悬挂在升降机上。皇室成员们眼看珊妮有危险都不出售相救撤离，所幸优彬及时救了珊妮才没有酿成悲剧。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 6
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 食尚玩家欢乐有够赞 Super Taste Super Joy - EP 1
programme.desc: A studio based variety show on quizes about food and cooking, histed by popular food hosts Zeng Guo Cheng and James (I-Walker). TVBS招牌节目《食尚玩家》改版，不仅节目名称换成《食尚玩家欢乐有够赞》，主持班底也确定以曾国城搭档詹姆士，配上外景双人组曾子余、Dora。.

programme.title: 食尚玩家欢乐有够赞 Super Taste Super Joy - EP 1
programme.desc: A studio based variety show on quizes about food and cooking, histed by popular food hosts Zeng Guo Cheng and James (I-Walker). TVBS招牌节目《食尚玩家》改版，不仅节目名称换成《食尚玩家欢乐有够赞》，主持班底也确定以曾国城搭档詹姆士，配上外景双人组曾子余、Dora。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 7
programme.desc: Ep7 - Dai Hua Guan's father is missing. Gao Zijie and Ruan Qingxin suspect that he has been kidnapped and imprisoned in a container parking lot. On another hand, Kent and Kate discover that Chen Wan Hui is using the place to hide stolen cash and other valuables. 戴华冠的父亲离奇失踪，高子杰与阮清欣怀疑他是遭人绑架，然后囚禁在那个堆满货柜箱的营地里。另一方面，令千佑和韦以柔发现，陈万辉利用那秘密营地，以藏匿见不得光的现金和值钱的赃物。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 8
programme.desc: Ep8 - Led by Kent, an armed squad raids Chen Wan Hui's fortified hideout and succeeds in rescuing Gao Zijie, Dai Hua Guan and his father from their captors. Later, an unknown party robs Chen Wan Hui's convoy, causing the conflict between Ling Xiong and him to escalate. 令千佑率领一支武装部队，突袭陈万辉的秘密营地，成功救出高子杰，戴华冠与其父。接着，陈万辉的赃物半路遭人抢劫，致使令熊与他之间的冲突，随之迅速 升级。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 7
programme.desc: Do you want a solution to your household troubles? Find out how a good mop can do more with less effort. 好的拖把能让家务事半功倍！你也想要一支解决你拖地的烦恼吧.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 10
programme.desc: This compression sock will help with your swollen feet, and also aids blood circulation! 压缩保健袜 - 脚肿、疼痛、血液不循环？穿上保健袜感受它带来的“压力"!

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 13
programme.desc: This Multi-functional food processor is capable of slicing, shredding as well as making noodles and juices! Mugen多功能原汁机 - 能切片、切丝、做.面条、榨果汁的原汁机，让你处理食物更添乐趣！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 11
programme.desc: How can you clean your home without using a single drop of detergent? Let our hosts show you how! H2O FX多功能蒸汽清洁机 - 无需消毒水即能消毒杀菌的蒸汽清洁器，也许能满足你的家务需求!

programme.title: 加油！向未来 Eureka Moment China - EP 5
programme.desc: "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life gameshow in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. 《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.

programme.title: 有故事的店 Shop Stories - EP 6
programme.desc: A former lady boss who marketed high-class wallets, sets up a dining car business. A fashion photographer sets up his own handmade leather shop. A young sports shoes manufacturer inherits his family business and expands by setting up a first basketball shoes museum for VIP guests. 原为高档皮包经销女老板，不畏辛苦开创餐车生意，力寻求新生机。时尚潮流摄影师为圆手工皮匠梦，制作纯手工提包，鲜少人问津，饱尝创业之苦。年轻运动鞋商，继承祖业，开创篮球鞋精品店，首设篮球鞋博物馆。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 7
programme.desc: After witnessing Hulk proposing to Xinyi, Pepper becomes totally devastated and has lost all motivation to continue her BMT training. Hoping to knock some sense into her, Recruit Rose gives Pepper a huge scolding and tells Pepper she should learn to live her life proud and happy without Hulk. Hulk跪下求婚，Pepper回到军营后好像行尸走肉一样，做任何训练都好不起劲，甚至萌起了退出队伍的念头。一开始加入Army的原因就是为了Hulk的，如今人家都要结婚了，继续下去又有什么意思呢？Rose最后忍无可忍，大骂Pepper，为了一个负心汉搞到自己这样，值得吗？.

programme.title: 一起轻旅行 Travel Together - EP 1
programme.desc: This food programme brings us to all corners of Taiwan in search of delicious and authentic Taiwanese food. Places of recommendation include Yi Lan, Bei Tou, Tai Nan, Kaohsiung etc. “一起轻旅行” 将带观众到台湾的各个角落，寻找正宗古早味的美食。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 4
programme.desc: Japan is an affluent society, which is why the issue of poverty often overlooked. In Osaka, there was an unfortunate incident where a mother and child starved to death at home. Determined to help the poor, a few monks decided to establish an anti-poverty organization that distributes temple offerings as gifts to families-in-need, providing them hope and bringing joy. 日本虽然是个富裕的社会，但是正因为贫穷问题不明显，挨饿的人往往更容易被忽略和遗忘。大阪就曾发生母子困在家中活活饿死的事件。一些僧侣为此发起了一个救贫组织，将庙宇的供品转送给贫穷家庭作礼物，带给他们欢乐。僧侣和志工们奔波忙碌，一起尝到助人为快乐之本的味道，也体验了幸福的真谛。.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 10
programme.desc: Much as the Swiss love their fondue, the Chinese are passionate about hot pot; or more commonly known as steamboat by Singaporeans. We travel to hot pot city Chengdu, the birth place of the spicy hot pot. Food Notes find out why people here eat spicy hot pot even during the hot summer months. (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 7
programme.desc: Ep 7: Wu Chun takes pity on Malu and his family when she sees that they do not have a roof over their heads. She suggests that they spend a night at the restaurant's store room. The next morning, Meida wants to throw them out when she mistakes Zhengji for a pervert. Ep 7: 吴春看到马陆和他的家人无家可归，同情他们，于是提议他们在餐厅的仓库睡一晚。隔天，美达看到衣衫不整的正基，以为他是暴露狂，要把他赶走。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 8
programme.desc: Ep 8: Shouhao enlists Zhi-e's help to cheat Shanying of a sum of money. Their plot falls through and Shouhao is brought home against his wish and locked up in his room. Ep 8: 智娥与善英见面，谎称自己跟守浩一起在加拿大留学，要善英代守浩偿还债务。眼见善英已经上钩了，守浩却在这时在餐厅外被吉秀逮个正着。守浩被善英带回家，关在房间里。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 5
programme.desc: Dehao believes the victim was dead before the restaurant was set on fire. He and Enzu find a witness near the scene where the traffic accident occurred three years ago. However, the witness has Alzheimer's disease... 德浩认为死者卢广修是在餐厅被纵火前已死去。他和恩祖在三年前的交通意外现场附近找到一位证人，可是那位证人竟是患有老人痴呆(失智症)的老婆婆李茉淑。。。。。。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 6
programme.desc: Dahe Group tries to force the tenants around the Old Lady's Potato Soup restaurant to move out on the pretext of re-development. Dehao has a strong attachment to the Old Lady's Potato Soup restaurant and treats the old lady owner as his own mother. He knows how important the restaurant is to the old lady so he decides to represent her in the eviction case. 大和集团借词说要重建，欲以妨碍营业的手法和使用暴力手段迫走现时老婆婆马铃薯汤店一带的租客。德浩对老婆婆马铃薯汤店有一份情谊，并与店主婆婆情如母子，深知老店对于婆婆的重要性，决定做老店的代表律师帮婆婆打被逼迁的官司。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 9
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 反斗红星去打工 - 印度篇 All Work No Pay Holidays - India - EP 1
programme.desc: Watch Ben Yuan and Mat Yeung experience all work no pay holiday working as a lunch deliveryman, laundry washer, driver, desert cleaner and a kindergarten teacher in India. 一连五集，袁伟豪、杨明以真人骚形式，在印度体验五份极具地道特色的工作。送饭、洗衫、做打杂看似小儿科，可是在摄氏五十度的高温、贫民窟一样的严酷环境工作，又是另一番滋味.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 5
programme.desc: A serious traffic accident happens in Seoul. Many casualties are sent to the hospital. Yanjing almost gets knocked over when she is busy attending to the casualties. Xu Ren rushes over to get hold of Yanjing and a pole pierces through their bodies. Xu Ren finds Yanjing and himself back in time to his era when he wakes up in the forest. 首尔发生了一起严重的交通事故，有许多的伤者被送往医院。妍京急着救伤者，差点被撞倒。许任赶紧去扶起妍京时，没想到身后有一根柱子插进了他们的身体。许任在林中醒过来时，发现自己和妍京已经穿越时空回到了他的朝代。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 6
programme.desc: Xu Ren and Yanjing encounter danger in the ancient time and travel back to the modern time. Yanjing yells excitedly when she wakes up and finds herself in familiar modern Seoul. She leaves Xu Ren behind and rushes to the hospital when she suddenly recalls that it is the day to operate on Hela. Meanwhile, Hela is throwing tantrum as she only allows Yanjing to operate on her. 许任和妍京在古代遇到了危险，于是就回到了现代。妍京醒来后看见自己在熟悉的首尔，激动得大喊大叫。她突然想起今天是荷拉做手术的日子，于是丢下许任赶去医院。而荷拉此时正在闹脾气，她只让妍京给她做手术。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 12
programme.desc: Ep 12Yin Mingzhus father agree to Mingzhus relationship with Xu Daying but demanded that Daying has to change trade. Liu Shizens superior instructed Liu to stop his investigation on Agus and his illegal trafficking of children. Liu Shizen was infuriated that the US was using Agus to engage in illegal arms smuggling. Ep 13Liu Shizen went to rescue Manager Tan after he was taken hostage by Agus at the airport. At the medical center, Tan suddenly fell ill and vomited blood. Jiang Muyan and Ep 12尹明珠的父亲同意她与徐大英的恋爱，但前提是徐大英必须退役转业。刘时镇的上级要刘时镇不能再追查阿古斯与他贩卖战争遗孤的事。刘时镇不满原因是美国在利用阿古斯走私军火。Ep 13陈所长在机场被阿古斯等人绑架，刘时镇前往营救。陈所长在医疗中心忽然病重吐血。姜暮研与尹明珠立刻进行急救。手术中，二人发现陈所长感染了M3型病毒，而这病是一种传染绝症！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 14
programme.desc: Jeremy and Charlyn attempt to hang 60kg of items onto this clothes rack! Will this rack fall apart? Ultimo折叠式衣架 - 集整齐收纳、晾衣功能于一身的衣架，使你眼前一亮！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 15
programme.desc: A durable non-stick frying pan is a kitchen must-have! 日本技术Evercook锅组 - 用不粘锅具组做无油料理，为你的健康加分！.

programme.desc: Jeremy Chan and Charlyn Lin our two lively hosts will introduce a range of practical and valuable appliances and products that will improve your quality of life leaving you with a smile! Buy now at www.jml.sg or call JML hotline 6742 2007 from Mon-Fri 9am-6pm, Sat-Sun 8am-4pm. 由两位活泼的主持人田铭耀以及林翠芳为你推荐实用好货，提升你的生活品质，让你天天都有好心情！即刻上网：www.jml.sg浏览，或于星期一至五上午9时至傍晚6时 ,周六至周日上午8点至下午4点, 拨打JML热线：6742 2007 订购产品。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 12
programme.desc: Are you looking for help to tackle that ever-growing pile of garments? This steam iron could be the answer! Steam Mate 手握蒸汽熨斗 - 挂烫平烫皆宜的蒸汽熨斗，为你减少熨烫时间！.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 1
programme.desc: 30 30 江苏卫视推出的一档大型脑力偶像竞技真人秀，由王峰、王昱珩、鲍橒担任队长，刘国梁担任战术指导，陶晶莹担任常驻嘉宾，每期还有特邀明星嘉宾的加入。第一轮挑战就是晋级30 强的百人淘汰赛，一百位选手同台比赛，最终只有30人成功晋级挑战赛，其余选手全部淘汰出局。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 6
programme.desc: Funtastic is a travelogue with a difference, various artistes in each episode who will bring viewers to their favourite travel destinations. They will introduce unique local specialties and interact with the locals. What's more, the artistes will be put to the test to overcome obstacles along the journey or undertake activities they have never attempted before. 非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S9 - EP 9
programme.desc: This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 9
programme.desc: Crying has always been viewed as a sign of weakness. However, some people in Japan are willing to pay handsome men to make them cry! Why do they want others to make them cry? Is it easy to make someone cry? Why is it that only handsome men can do this job? Let's find out more with the host in Japan. 流泪、哭泣一向来被认为是软弱、承受不了压力的不光彩行为。但在日本，却有人愿意花钱找帅哥来弄哭自己！为什么会有人迫切想被弄哭？催人落泪到底是容易，还是困难的事？为什么只有帅哥才能胜任这份工作？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到日本一探究竟。.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 3
programme.desc: Aun Koh arrives in Jodhpur, India, for the king's favourite, a meat stew called Kachar Maans. Dating back some 200 years, it was originally cooked in the jungle with game meat hunted on royal expeditions. But with hunting now banned in India, how can this deluxe camping food fit for royalty survive? 为了寻找消失中的印度焖肉美食博客许安来到了贾拉斯坦邦。两百多年前，皇家探险队会在打猎时把得到的肉烹煮成焖肉。如今印度已完全禁止打猎，这道属于皇家探险时必煮的佳肴，要如何传承下去？.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 3
programme.desc: Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. 洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 9
programme.desc: Ep 9: Juxi tries to stop Yalan from ordering the winery to add artificial additives to Pung Gil Dong's wine. Yalan appears to agree with Juxi, but secretly orders the winery to carry out her instructions. Ep 9: 菊熙听说雅兰指使员工在丰吉堂的酒内加入人工添加剂，立刻阻止雅兰。雅兰表面答应不舍弃传统，私底下却要员工秘密进行她下达的命令。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 10
programme.desc: Ep 10: Meida slaps both Malu and Wu Chun when she assumes that they have improperly spent a night together. Later on, Meida realises that both of them were actually working overnight. Ep 10: 吴春说去打工却一整晚都没有回家。美达误以为吴春和马陆两人一起外宿，各打他们一巴掌，后来才发现错怪了他们。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 7
programme.desc: Dehao knows Dahe Group wants to force out the tenants because of re-development. He agglomerates the tenants in the area to resist the conglomerate and fight for their rights. Enzu is assigned to take up the Old Lady's Potato Soup restaurant eviction case. She wavers between her sympathy for the tenants and her duty as the landlord's representative. 德浩知道大和集团用暴力迫走这一带的街店租客，根本不是为了重建百货公司。他凝聚小区一众人的力量对抗大集团，为租客争回公道。恩祖被金山法律事务所派去负责处理老婆婆马铃薯汤店的明渡诉讼，徘徊于自己的怜悯之心和为大楼房东代理人工作的责任之间。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 8
programme.desc: The Old Lady's Potato Soup restaurant case has severely damaged Dahe Group's corporate image. Michael gets reprimanded by his father, Chairman Zheng. Michael bears a grudge against Dehao for this. He captures Dehao and attempts to kill him. Dehao's daughter, Xiubin, suddenly visits Dehao after three long years. Dehao is surprised and feels odd... 因老婆婆马铃薯汤店的事已经严重破坏了大和集团的企业形象，麦可被父亲郑会长责骂了一顿。麦可因此对德浩含恨在心，捉走德浩并企图杀死他。时隔三年不见的女儿秀彬突然偷偷跑去德浩的事务所看他，让他又惊又奇。。。。。。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 2
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 7
programme.desc: Xu Ren cannot get back to his time and has to find ways to survive in Seoul. He first lodges at Yanjing's grandfather's home. After that, he sends in a job application to the Xinhui Korean Medicine Hospital and asks the director directly whether he can work there. 许任一直无法回到他的朝代，只好找方法在首尔生活。 他先去寄住在妍京爷爷的家， 然后向新惠韩方医院提交申请就职, 直接询问医院的院长可否让他在那里工作。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 8
programme.desc: Yanjing's grandfather, Qianshu takes Xu Ren along for his routine treatment of the beggars under the overhead bridge. Qianshu does not charge any fee for the medical treatment. However, his hands keep shaking when he applies acupuncture due to his old age. Xu Ren observes Qianshu and recalls his experience treating the poor back in his era. 妍京的爷爷千述例行要去给天桥下的乞丐治病，他带着许任一起前去。千述给乞丐治病一律不收取任何费用，但是因他年纪大了，扎针的时候手不住发抖。许任在旁看着千述的所作所为，想起他在古代给穷人治病的经历。.

programme.title: Tetangga Sr 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. After receiving a complaint, an officer from the Ministry of Environment arrives at Faridah's doorstep, inspecting her flowerpots for mosquitoes. Confident that the complainant is Nancy, Faridah confronts her neighbour. It is not until their husbands cleverly devised a trick to bring both ladies together again that the misunderstanding is cleared. Meanwhile, a desperate and panicky Raju is helpless as his wife goes into labour. Ready to lend a helping hand to a friend in need, Hassan offers to take Raju and his wife to the hospital in his taxi. Daisy gives birth to a healthy baby boy. Beaming with pride, the new father thanks Hassan profusely. This incident makes Mrs Raju more friendly towards her neighbours. Feeling a pang of guilt, Raju finally admits to be the culprit who complains about Faridah's flower pots. The misunderstanding between the neighbours is finally cleared. Everyone rejoices the arrival of the new addition to the Ra.

programme.title: Tetangga Sr 1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. On one of his night shifts, Hassan foils a robbery attempt. While putting up a struggle in the taxi, Hassan is slightly injured. His friend who happens to pass by, came to his rescue. Hassan is hospitalized.Feeling sorry for Faridah, the neighbours offer to help. While Daisy helps with getting the groceries, Nancy 'keeps an eye' on Faridah's elderly parents. Nancy has 2 sons - Alan, aged 12 and Marcus, 18. While Faridah and family are at the hospital, the sons often drop by to say hello to Tok Mat and Nek Sumi. Here, they realize that the elderly couple has much in common with them and has plenty to share. Tok Mat even gives a few tips to Marcus on how to find that ideal girlfriend. Marcus's presence in the house even helps to foil an attempt to rob the old couple. For this, the Hassans are grateful to their supportive neighbours. The families decide to pay each other more visits to ensure the safety of their neighbourhood.

programme.title: Tetangga Sr 1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. One morning, an irritated neighbour and his son appear on Hassan's doorstep. He accuses Hassan's younger son, Faisal of stealing his brand new pair of soccer boots. The allegation against his son makes Hassan weary of Faisal's behaviour and attitude. Faisal is not academically-inclined. He seems to be more interested in playing skateboard and the guitar than in his studies.A concerned Hassan goes to Ronnie for some parenting advice. Ronnie offers to help by asking his eldest son, Marcus to give free tuition. However, Faisal shows no interest with Marcus teaching him. He prefers Allen instead. Allen treats him more like a buddy. Meanwhile, stealing becomes so rampant in the neighbourhood. This has caused Raju to join the Neighbourhood Watch Scheme. His decision does not make Daisy happy as he spends less time with their baby. However, Raju is determined to render his service because of his love for the nation. Due to his enthusiasm,.

programme.title: Tetangga Sr 1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Trouble stirs when Nancy receives threatening calls from a loan shark, claiming that he owes them a large sum in debt. The loan sharks imprint claims and heaps all kinds of rubbish on Mr Chan's door. Other neighbours in the block are beginning to believe that Ronnie owes loan sharks a lot of money. Nancy who becomes suspicious of her own husband, starts asking Hasan and Raju about Ronnie. However, both the Hassans and the Rajus, stand by the Chans. They cannot believe that Ronnie will borrow money from a loan shark. Meanwhile, Tok Mat and Nek Sumi persuade Hassan to buy a new computer as the old one is spoilt. Tok Mat encourages Hassan to invest his money on education. Raju's legal background helps in investigating the case. Members of the 3 families took turns to play investigator. Later, they manage to catch the culprit and then discover that it is a case of mistaken identity.Ronnie is glad that his problem has been solved. He deci.

programme.title: SG Mania 3 Finale
programme.desc: The grand finals of SG Mania will see three singers vying for the top spot. They will be belting both solo and duet numbers with Singapore's best music icons. Featuring the legendary Sweet Charity as icon of the finals, the trio will also be belting a group number. With their own interpretation, the two best finalists will do a Final Face-off with one of Sweet Charity's popular and evergreen number.

programme.title: My ID is Gangnam Beauty - EP 11
programme.desc: After the movie date for the assignment, Do Kyung Seok treats Kang Mi Rae a dinner. He wants to know a bit about her, wants to see her handwriting of what it looks like, wants to know when her birthday is but Kang Mi Rae reveal neither. She doesn't want to let Do Kyung Seok know when her birthday is because she doesn't want to get her hopes up. Upon hearing from Kang Mi Rae, Do Kyung Seok says that she can't let Yeon Woo Young know her birthday either then.

programme.title: My ID is Gangnam Beauty - EP 12
programme.desc: After moved out from father's house, Do Kyung Seok struggle with money to pay for the rent, daily meals and fares for the transport. Hyun Soo Ah directs Do Kyung Seok to the coffee shop she works at and got hired upon Hyun Soo Ah's special request. However, he turns the job offer down immediately after overhearing a staff member that the boss hires based on appearance and he was the most inferior in terms of appearance out of the other staff members.

programme.title: Cantik Detektif - EP 1
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Host Huda Ali starts her beauty adventure in Indonesia, where beauty traditions steeped in ancient rituals and customs are handed down from royal families. Travelling from Jakarta to Jogjakarta she tries 'Jamu Gali-Galiang' which is supposed to have a slimming effect on women; discovers why the 'Sanggul Paes', an official hair-do for the Kraton's royals, is a must for most Indonesian brides; and experiences the therapeutic effect of the 'Kerokan' treatment, which only needs a humble coin.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini - Hael Husaini
programme.desc: Bintang Minggu Ini or Artis of the Week programme is especially for artist that is still relevant in the industry and have incredible aura. The programme is also a special platform for singers to perform as an appreciation for their fans. This week we have Misha Omar with her invited guests Amy Mastura and Idayu.

programme.title: Romantika Sr 8 - EP 5
programme.desc: A vibrant sprawling metropolis, catch Hafidz Roshdi as he travel with his wife to Surabaya, the capital of East Java and the second largest city in Indonesia. Taste the experience as he explores the interesting places of modern skyscrapers mixed with canals and buildings from its Dutch Colonial past.

programme.title: Cucu Tok Selampit - EP 1
programme.desc: 6 girls will tell a story based on the theme Warna Warni Harmoni (Colours in Harmony) within 1.5 minutes. In this episode, one of them will be eliminated. The other 5 contestants will advance to the next level.

programme.title: Demi Cinta - EP 5
programme.desc: Wan tries to uncover more secrets from Natasha's past. He wants to understand why she seems so unfeeling and allergic to love. Natasha avoids him and immersed herself in work, diligently going overboard by featuring 2 couples with 2 different weddings, in one week.

programme.title: Jasa Aktivis - EP 6
programme.desc: In Manila, Tuloy Foundation is a shelter and training school for street children of a different kind. Fadli meets Father Rocky and learns how he grooms former street children to become the finest chefs and ballet dancers in the world stage.

programme.title: The Samsons - EP 2
programme.desc: The Samsons is a fictional Malay family who lives in a typical HDB home in Singapore. The family comprises of the couple, Samson and DD Cun and their respective single parents. Samson's mother, Mak Ti, also happens to be the first ex-wife of DD Cun's father, Pak Jon. These elder duo can barely see eye to eye without erupting into an argument.Samson has weekly celebrity guests over at his home to discuss trending topics and issues relatable to the community. While trying to extract valuable lessons in life and important tips from invited guests, the topsy-turvy family also have to deal with their own disagreements and family issues that would usually turn out into hilarious banters.

programme.title: Curi Curi Cinta - EP 22
programme.desc: Mak Long is fuming mad when Fazira is not making any effort with Daniel to plan for their wedding. programme.title: Zoom New Zealand - EP 5
programme.desc: Backpacking around New Zealand, filled with epic scenery, unique cultural experiences and amazing outdoor activities everywhere will be an eye opener. Fadhlur and Syarif are to go behind the wheels on a road trip where they will drive from one point to the next destination and they make new friends along the way. Getting closer to nature will make this season different, where camping in the wild and hunting for food source will be a challenge for them in order to understand how the aborigines live.

programme.title: Detik 2019-2020 - EP 37
programme.desc: The half hour program analyses and dissect issues of concern to the Malay-Muslim Singaporeans - be it at the community level, national, regional or global. programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 1
programme.desc: While waiting for her divorce to be finalised, Suliah's decision to co-habitate with another man, Meor, incurred the wrath of the traditional village folks, resulting in the latter shunning her. Concurrently, the villagers were also surprised at how Suliah managed to sustain herself and Meor without having any visible means of employment. Meanwhile, money and other items have mysteriously disappeared from the villagers' houses, fuelling rumours that Suliah actually kept a 'toyol' to steal items from them for her own benefit. Interestingly, the village is also home to a group of drug addicts who would stop at nothing to get their next 'fix'.

programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 9
programme.desc: After 25 years of searching, Pak Ali met his long-lost neighbour, Pak Raman at the Home for the Aged. The meeting brought back memories of his younger days where he stayed in the same kampong with Pak Raman, now known as Pak Salleh. He relates to Razak, the Home's administrator about what happened to his life, and why and how he plotted to take revenge on Pak Salleh. All his life, Ali believed that the flamboyant Raman had used black magic to run away with his wife. But in reality, Ali's wife actually ran away with his sister's fiance. Raman, not a local and known for his dubious character, became the main suspect when the villagers found a body with a burnt chin at the village cemetery. Not able to withstand the humiliation from Ali and his sister, Fatimah, Raman decided to take revenge. He met Tok Batin, a medicine man to get even with them. He used Minyak Dagu to seduce Fatimah. After impregnated Fatimah, Raman ran away from the village.

programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 13
programme.desc: Asmah is dying. The villagers believed that she had been cursed. The doctor who treated her found needles inside her body. Asmah's children looked for Mariah for help. The latter was Asmah's good friend, who vehemently believed that Asmah's sickness was caused by the susuk. They have had lived the high life in the past. Asmah believed that her marriage failed because she was not pretty and attractive to keep her husband. She took 'susuk', believing that her life will change for the better. Asmah finally died. Mariah tried to convince the family members that Asmah's death had nothing to do with her wrongdoings.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi Sr 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A spoilt child, Sazali grows up to be the most wanted robber in town. One day he plans to rob a bank and thus, he asks his accomplice, Jenal to get a map of the bank. Jenal manages to get the map but they could not read the map which is written in 'Jawi'. Coincidentally, a 'madrasah' boy, Atan visits them when they were struggling to read the map. An effort to sell charity coupons turn into a nightmare for Atan when he is forced to read what is written on the map. Only then, they discover that the map is actually the layout of an abundant graveyard. Sazali's another accomplice, Bohari finally gets the right map but Hassan, Sazali's dad has accidentally thrown it away. Sazali and his accomplices decide to rob without any map. Unfortunately, they end up with misfortune when the policemen arrest them.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi Sr 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Azura and Zack are earning a modest living by selling Azura's Pau and Zack's Pancake at a coffee shop. Azura who has been kicked out of the house by her aunty and Zack who has forsaken his silver spoon life promised by his father, Dato' Putih, decide to make a life for each other. The loving and happy couple is always seen singing and dancing, relishing every moment they have together. Mak Tam and Pak Mat, the other two vendors who are selling noodles and chicken rice respectively begin to suspect that something is amiss with the new tenants. Azura and Zack will begin selling late in the day and will finish early. Coincidentally, the coffee shop receives customers, a wealthy businessman and a sultry wannabe singer who will eventually buy all of Azura and Zack's kuihs. Furthermore Mak Tam and Pak Mat's customers are dwindling, badly affecting their business. They decide to spring into action and get to the crux of their suspicion. A few days after, Zack is surprised to meet his father a.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi - EP 1
programme.desc: The comedy centers on an old man who tries to act gungho and hip. When he gets a job as a night-club bouncer, another old-timer is jealous. Soon, young gangsters also start to confront them too.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi - EP 2
programme.desc: An old widower lives with his married children but finds that none of them are willing to take care of him. So, he devises a plan to win their hearts, hoping in return, they will look after him. Instead, his children decide to search for a life partner for him.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi - EP 3
programme.desc: Farid and Maznah are married but unhappy. Farid begins to see the good side of his married life when his old friends pay him a visit. His friends even give him tips on how to keep his married life happy and lasting. Maznah, on the other hand, is quite shocked by the sudden changes in Farid's behaviour and becomes more worried and suspicious. The situation soon gets hilarious and chaotic but thankfully, all well ends well.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi - EP 5
programme.desc: Mamu Jarum is the male version of Mami Jarum - the successful comedy on gossip, jealousy and scandals. This comedy shows the funny side of male gossip-mongers when they meet at a coffee shop.

programme.title: Janji Sedap - EP 12
programme.desc: Join our chef as he takes you to a culinary journey and learn how to whip up vibrant and flavoursome cuisine.

programme.title: Menantu International 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Melissa decides to leave Adam after he betrays her trust. Things are looking up for Khalid who has proven that he is a good dad and a changed person. Hana gets caught delivering drugs and Khalid took the fall for her. GuoZheng comes to Singapore and ends up fighting with Aman.

programme.title: Satu Famili Sr 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: SATU FAMILI is a RACE within Singapore and her islands where teams of families compete using clues and maps to locate secret treasure points where they face a series of collective tasks that challenge people to think 'outside the box'. Quick decisions and solutions lead to success. This will be an opportunity to test each of their capabilities in a familiar or unfamiliar yet fun environment, and build team relationships.

programme.title: Tak2ut - EP 7
programme.desc: One night after supper, Dino sends Tina back to her house on his motorcycle, when they are stopped by a frantic woman at a secluded park. The woman, Rosita, claims that she and her boyfriend Rizal have seen the Penanggal (Flying Head). They have lost each other in their fright. She begs Dino and Tina to help her find Rizal. Dino and Tina spring to action. They find Rizal unconscious by a tree. Dino and Tina call for a cab and send the couple to hospital. Rosita tearfully relates how Rizal brought her to the park that night, for a 'night picnic' by the stars. Rizal is just about to propose to her, when they see the Penanggal flying over them!

programme.title: Duda Pujaan Dara - EP 11
programme.desc: To most girls, getting a young rich and available man is a dream come true, but not for Ainee Marwah.She prefers a divorcee, who she believes has a lot of experience and can take better care of her. Her wish comes true when she happens to work in a company owned by Tengku Razeen, who is a widowed single father. In fact, Tengku Razeen is looking for a new life partner after the death of his wife, but did not expect Ainee to be interested in him. While Tengku Razeen is away on business trip, Ainee receives a picture of him and Dora.She feels cheated and believes that he is having an affair behind her back.

programme.title: J.K.K S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: A story of Kampung Kalut residents that is filled with conflicts. The residents frequently hold meetings about their problems with the Village Headman and Village Council no matter how silly the problem is. This week, they head over to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Tak Ada Cinta Sepertimu - EP 7
programme.desc: Athea is assigned as Azam interior designer for his homestay project. Coincidentally Azam is Athea's ex-boyfriend. He is a single dad with two young daughters. Bella's colleague, Abby feels unhappy with Bella close relationship with Kamarul because Bella is engaged to Hazran yet stil have an affair with Kamarul. Hazran goes back home to tell her mother, Aminah about Athea. He persuaded her that Athea is a good lady. Hazran's friends encourages him to meet and apologize to Athea.

programme.title: Cantik Detektif - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Gorgeous radiant skin, long silky hair and youthful looks make us envy everything about Thai women. But how is it that they are able to defy time even in their advancing years? Host Huda Ali investigates Thailand's novel beauty secrets that have been passed down from generation to generation. From a 16th century Thai tradition of Hermit Contortion that promises longevity to the 5000 year old 'Tok Sen' (hammer massage) that is said to have the same benefits of acupuncture but without the needles, Huda tries them all to find out the truth behind the claims.

programme.title: Setia Menunggumu - EP 12
programme.desc: After two years of soul searching, Adi returns home upon hearing that his father is critically ill. Adi is surprised when the doctor diagnoses his father as HIV positive. But what shocks him even more is when his father reveals that he is not his real son.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 1
programme.desc: Di Hujung Pelangi takes a look at the inspirational journeys of special families with special needs children who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. In general, the three types of spina bifida (from mild to severe) are Spina Bifida Occulta, Meningocele and Myelomeningocele. The effects of myelomeningocele, the most serious form of spina bifida, may include muscle weakness or paralysis below the area of the spine where the incomplete closure (or cleft) occurs, loss of sensation below the cleft, and loss of bowel and bladder control. This episode highlights a family whose child suffers from spina bifida and has had a series of operations throughout her childhood. She suffers learning problems such as difficulty with paying attention, expressing or understanding language, and grasping reading and math. The interviews will highlight how early diagnosis and intervention has helped her to prepare and cope with sc.

programme.title: Helo Switzerland - EP 1
programme.desc: This Travelogue features host Ben Ali's exploration to several important destinations in Switzerland including the popular big cities, small towns and interesting locations in the outskirts. More interestingly, many adventure tips for budget travelers will be revealed to guide the audience.Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders - but the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. This feature gives us access to some of Singapore's most unique islands.

programme.title: Hola Spain Bersama Keith Foo - EP 2
programme.desc: Hola! Spain Bersama Keith Foo brings audience to Keith Foo's exploration in Spain. programme.title: Insight - EP 37
programme.desc: A major humanitarian crisis is unfolding in India after more than 1.9 million people living in India's north-eastern state of Assam were left out of the National Register of Citizens (NRC). The results of the NRC, seen in conjunction with a contentious citizenship law, can leave a large number of people, predominantly Muslims, potentially stateless. Indian Home Minister, Amit Shah, has described illegal immigrants as "infiltrators" and "termites" who are sucking the nation's resources dry.

programme.title: Insight - EP 37
programme.desc: A major humanitarian crisis is unfolding in India after more than 1.9 million people living in India's north-eastern state of Assam were left out of the National Register of Citizens (NRC). The results of the NRC, seen in conjunction with a contentious citizenship law, can leave a large number of people, predominantly Muslims, potentially stateless. Indian Home Minister, Amit Shah, has described illegal immigrants as "infiltrators" and "termites" who are sucking the nation's resources dry.
